ygData.subject: Re: My thoughts
ygData.msgSnippet: You are very wrong! That quest DID NOT always work!!! I did that quest with my level 6 monk on tunare and got an ogre head. It ws when the quest was still easy
ygData.messageBody:
You are very wrong! That quest DID NOT always work!!! I did that quest with
my level 6 monk on tunare and got an ogre head. It ws when the quest was
still easy to do and not fully implimented. I don't know where you get this
about it always being in the game, because you are dead wrong, I know that
first hand to.

> > Minor Correction here. The Glowing Stien was NOT part of the game until
>less than
> > 1 week before the spoiler went up. It was the reward for the Brewers
>Compendium
> > Quest. The quest, until recently, was broken. It returned Pungala's
>head (Ogre
> > Head), not the compendium. Many bartender's have tried this quest, and
>it was a
> > bartender who first completed it. On a side note, GM's informed
>several players
> > that the quest indeed worked, before the patch. They then came back and
>said it
> > will be fixed in an up coming patch (Another Lie)
>
>No the quest always worked, the problem was that no one had used all the
>proper spells
>on the Ogre to raise the faction high enough. That is why an enchanter was
>required
>to do the quest, which was the part that the general population of norrath
>didn't
>figure out until a week before the last patch.
>
>--Eron
>aeron@...
